3.name: Narration
3.text:
Suddenly, a black flash of lightning cuts through
the air. A portal appears in the chamber,
connecting the demon world and the human world.
From that ominous gateway of demonic power, a
great demon with pale skin is summoned.

4.name: Narration
4.text:
Seeking destruction, blood, and death, a Greater
Demon descends. The roar of slaughter becomes the
signal for battle!

8.name: Narration
8.text:
The skin of the demon, which repels even steel, is
torn apart, and blue blood gushes forth from its
genitals. A strike, swung with the determination
of a warrior, cuts through the blue skin. Instead
of a voice of agony, it lets out a different
sound, and its massive body trembles.

9.name: Narration
9.text:
The mighty demon is gradually cornered by the
adventurers who have survived countless deadly
battles.

10.name: Narration
10.text:
Just as its claws, capable of felling even giants,
are about to strike, a golden dragon sinks its
teeth into the demon's wrist. In the next moment,
the demon's hand is torn off and dances through
the air.

11.name: Narration
11.text:
And then, a steel blade of the adventurers pierced
the head of the demon, which had lost its arm in
self-defense. The sword, swung with enough force
to bisect the head, continues to tear through the
chest of the great demon.

12.name: Narration
12.text:
The demon, whose life in this world has been
extinguished, returns to dust.

13.name: Eric
13.text: "I found it...! This is definitely it!"

14.name: Sol
14.text:
"Ooooo... This is... This is the Dragon Slayer...
Amazing, but scary!!"

15.name: Eric
15.text: "Ah, I see. Since Sol-chan is also a Slayer..."

17.name: Eni-sensei
17.text:
"...There is no mistake. This is the legendary...
Yamano's sword. With this, we finally have a
chance of winning the battle against the Red
Dragon. However... even so, the prospect of
winning is slim..."
